Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you came, <MYNAME>!
Would you like to try playing the tune
<RED>"The Lion's Dance"</RED>?
Play
Don't play

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>The Lion's Dance</RED> is:
<ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Ready to stop playing?
Tell me the tune again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll tell you again!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Lion Dance</RED> is:
<ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Play faster!
Don't be such a slowpoke!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Do you want to quit playing?
Continue playing
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I want you to play faster!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Lion Dance</RED> is:
<ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You played it wrong!
Come on, try it again from the top!
Try playing again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, concentrate!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Lion Dance</RED> is:
<ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee-hee-hee-hee.
You hit the right notes!
Great performance!
<PAGE>
So we're going to give you a prize!
Go ahead, Aaron!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right!
<PAGE>
Your prize this time is a blueprint!
Come over here, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's your blueprint!
Take it!

<SPEED_IMME>
You got a blueprint for a
<GREEN>mechanical lion</GREEN>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't that cool, <MYNAME>?
Now you can make something new!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's the last tune for the musical
stumps!
I'm impressed you could play them all!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, <MYNAME>?
You actually got genuine praise from
my sister!
<PAGE>
I'm happy for you!
Congratulations!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What are you so happy for?
You get carried away over anything!
<PAGE>
So, are you satisfied, <MYNAME>?
Take advantage of all those great
prizes to improve life on your farm!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're doing great, <MYNAME>!
Keep it up!
We're rooting for you!
